meanings.definition: An area of land and its buildings used for growing crops and raising animals.
meanings.sent1: The farms in our town have cows and corn.
meanings.sent2: We visited the farms to see the chickens and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The pig on the farm tried to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The farms were like bustling villages of plants and animals.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the farms lingered in the fresh air.

meanings.definition: To cultivate land or raise animals for food or other products.
meanings.sent1: They farms the fields to grow wheat for bread.
meanings.sent2: We farms the land to provide food for the community.
meanings.sent3: The farmer farms the soil with care and dedication.
meanings.sent4: She farms her backyard garden with love and attention.
meanings.sent5: Farming requires hard work and patience to be successful.
